page.title: Observable Properties Pane
page.introduction: The Observables are specified and edited using mouse right click in the bottom Object Properites pane. Only annotation can be typed in.

list.item: Observable name: Right click to add Species Pattern (species with a given set of features).
Species Pattern: Right click to delete Pattern or Add Molecules that constitute pattern.

Molecule is added with all sites being in unspecified state (white). Right click on a site to choose a state and specify bond - a site can be connected to any other site in a species pattern, or be declared bound or unbound.
